inclusion.criterion: Initiating long-acting insulin treatment or initiating the titration of long-acting insulin treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to inject insulin
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to provide informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Sustained elevated serum creatinine > or = 1.5 mg/dL for men and > or = 1.4 mg/dL for women
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes and is initiating long-acting insulin treatment. He speaks English.
